title: Growing Food in Urban Small Spaces - Urban Gardening

tasks.task: Set up and manage various growing locations in urban gardens.
subtasks: Assemble raised beds using cedar.
Construct a waist-high salad bar for easier pest management.
Install a DIY trellis system for vertical gardening of melons.
Use containers and gutters for year-round cultivation.
Grow dwarf fruit trees in small spaces.
Practice companion planting and use protective barriers for crops.
Harvest herbs directly from portable terracotta pots.
Plan for multi-season crop rotations in containers and raised beds.
Utilize community garden plots for expanded growing areas.
Organically protect plot crops from pests using innovative methods.
Diversify tomato varieties and manage fruit set.

tasks.task: Maintain and harvest crops from both backyard and community garden plots.
subtasks: Water, fertilize, and tend to raised bed vegetables.
Care for dwarf fruit trees and harvest their fruits.
Tend to container herbs and vegetables in the lobby and front porch.
Monitor and address pest issues in community garden plot.
Rotate crops within containers and raised beds seasonally.
Pick ripe produce from garlic, beans, tomatoes, peppers, herbs, etc., as they mature.
Encourage other city dwellers to start their own gardens.
Share successful techniques for small-space food production.
Inspire community involvement in local food growing through urban plots.

tasks.task: 1. **Maintain and set up various growing locations (MAINTASK)**
2. **Maintain and harvest crops from both backyard and community garden plots (MAINTASK)**
